title: Tell me about a day you remember well.

korean: 음, 제가 제일 잘 기억하는 날은 대학 졸업식 날이에요.
그날 아침에 일찍 일어나서 졸업 가운 입고 학교로 갔어요.
4년 전 입학식 때가 생각나면서 시간이 정말 빨리 갔다는 생각이 들었어요.
졸업장 받을 때는 정말 뿌듯하기도 하고 아쉽기도 했어요.
졸업식 끝나고 친구들이랑 캠퍼스 곳곳에서 사진 찍고 돌아다녔어요.
우리가 자주 가던 학식당, 도서관, 벤치 이런 데서요.
저녁에는 가족들이랑 식사하고, 밤에는 친구들이랑 술 마시면서 추억 얘기했어요.
웃기도 하고 울기도 하면서 정말 특별한 하루였어요.
그날 이후로 삶의 새로운 장이 시작된 것 같아요.
english: Um, the day I remember best is my college graduation day.
It was the day my 4 years of college life ended.
That morning I woke up early, put on my graduation gown, and went to school.
My parents came too, and all my friends gathered.
When I entered the graduation hall, I had new feelings.
Remembering the entrance ceremony 4 years ago, I thought time really passed quickly.
When receiving my diploma, I felt really proud but also regretful.
After the graduation ceremony, I walked around taking photos with friends all over campus.
At the cafeteria we often went to, the library, benches, places like that.
In the evening I had dinner with family, and at night I drank with friends and talked about memories.
Laughing and crying, it was a really special day.
Since that day, it feels like a new chapter of life started.
